Html:
Hi, whenever I click on one of the demo's buttons, everything looks ok, but I' can't use the markers, please help. I am using a GE 98756 MiniCam Pro webcam.
-----------------------------------------------------
I got a new webcam, the Microsoft LifeCam VX-1000. It should work with the application.

Hi tiggman93, Please let me know exactly what you're having trouble with.
On the "Markers" tab, try clicking the "Help!" button on the bottom left. This will give you tips on how to add a marker.
Once you successfully add a marker, you'll see a box around it and the matched pixels will beÂ highlighted; then you're ready to use the demos.
- Mike
